  <p>[RMarkdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/) `r emo::ji("page_facing_up")` [{bs4cards}](https://bs4cards.djnavarro.net/index.html) `r emo::ji("card_file_box")` [Bungee](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bungee+Hairline?category=Display&preview.text=faxcrayon.art&preview.text_type=custom) `r emo::ji("abc")` [Pages](https://pages.github.com/) `r emo::ji("computer_disk")`</p>
